title: It Ain't Me, Babe
description: Female cartoonists Robbins, Mendes, and "Hurricane" Nancy Kalish (who sometimes signed her work "Panzika") were frustrated with the boy's club atmosphere of underground comix, which was dominated by male artists glorying in their depictions of sex, drugs and rock & roll â€” and the casual misogyny typical of those stories.The 36-page one-shot was published in July 1970.
author: Trina Robbins
